docs.snippet: Though Serena and Venus Williams have forcefully carried the flag for American tennis, the United States Tennis Association has made little progress in identifying and developing African-American stars....
docs.lead_paragraph: Though Serena and Venus Williams have forcefully carried the flag for American tennis, the United States Tennis Association has made little progress in identifying and developing African-American stars.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column criticizes lack of black players competing in United States Open.

docs.snippet: Harvey, who has helped lead the Mets back to respectability, would be wise to tune out critics and listen to those who have his best interests at heart....

docs.abstract: Michael Powell Sports of The Times column examines play of New York Mets pitcher Matt Harvey and his return from elbow surgery; suggests Harvey listen to his agent and err on side of caution with health of his arm.

docs.snippet: Veteran Peru striker Claudio Pizarro signed a one-year contract with Werder Bremen on Monday for a third spell at the former Bundesliga champions after three success-laden seasons at Bayern Munich....

docs.snippet: There are no recognizable soccer fields, no players, and just a rusting goalpost at Pakistan's Hawksbay training center, built with a $500,000 FIFA grant on a windswept plot by the Arabian Sea near Karachi, and officially completed two years ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: There are no recognizable soccer fields, no players, and just a rusting goalpost at Pakistan's Hawksbay training center, built with a $500,000 FIFA grant on a windswept plot by the Arabian Sea near Karachi, and officially completed two years ago.
